Class: TurtleRouterModule

TurtleRouterModule(app, configs)

TurtleRouterModule manages routing in a Turtle application. It handles matching routes, invoking callbacks, and rendering components based on URLs.

Constructor

new TurtleRouterModule(app, configs)

Creates a new TurtleRouterModule instance.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
app Object

The Turtle app instance this router is attached to.
configs Object

Configuration for the router, including the root element.

Classes

TurtleRouterModule

Methods

emitEvent(name, data)

Emits an event.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The event name.
data *

The data to pass with the event.

(async) matches(url) → {Promise.<void>}

Matches the provided URL against the router's routes.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
url string

The URL to match against the defined routes.
Returns:
  • A promise that resolves when the match is complete.
Type
Promise.<void>

off(event, callback)

Unregisters an event listener for a specific router event.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
event string

The name of the event.
callback function

The callback function to remove.

on(event, callback)

Registers an event listener for a specific router event.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
event string

The name of the event (e.g., 'pagechange', 'notfound').
callback function

The function to call when the event is triggered.

redirect(path, replaceopt)

Redirects to a new route.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
path string

The path to navigate to.
replace boolean <optional>
 false

Whether to replace the current URL or push a new one.

start()

Starts the router and listens for changes in the URL.

triggerError(name)

Triggers a router error event.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The error event name (e.g., 'not_allow', 'not_found').

(static) init(app, configs) → {TurtleRouterModule}

Initializes the TurtleRouterModule.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
app Object

The Turtle app instance.
configs Object

Configuration for the router.
Returns:
  • The initialized router module.
Type
TurtleRouterModule
